title: Kindred
body:
This is just a thought but like Kindred should totally get a blood moon skin!! 

Just seeing there are some new upcoming blood moon skins for Pyke, Sivir and Aatrox, looking at Kinder she would fit into the blood moon so well.

Honestly I think Kindred is still a well played champ and was picked during worlds a bit (banned a lot too), but I think she's a champ who deserves to get another skin at least within the next year. So if riot ever see's this pleaseeeeeeeeeeee consider giving Kindred an awesome new skin! <3
